symptoms.name: reading_difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you find it challenging to read quickly or accurately?

symptoms.name: spelling_errors
symptoms.question: Do you frequently make spelling errors, even in simple words?

symptoms.name: letter_reversal
symptoms.question: Do you often reverse letters or numbers when reading or writing?

symptoms.name: difficulty_rhyming
symptoms.question: Do you have trouble recognizing or producing rhyming words?

symptoms.name: slow_reading
symptoms.question: Do you read at a slower pace compared to your peers?

symptoms.name: inattention
symptoms.question: Do you often have difficulty sustaining attention on tasks or activities?

symptoms.name: hyperactivity
symptoms.question: Do you frequently feel restless or fidgety?

symptoms.name: impulsivity
symptoms.question: Do you often act without thinking about the consequences?

symptoms.name: disorganization
symptoms.question: Do you struggle with organizing tasks and managing time effectively?

symptoms.name: forgetfulness
symptoms.question: Do you often forget daily activities or lose things necessary for tasks?

symptoms.name: number_sense_difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you find it hard to understand quantities or concepts like greater than and less than?

symptoms.name: calculation_difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you struggle with basic arithmetic operations like addition and subtraction?

symptoms.name: time_management_issues
symptoms.question: Do you have trouble reading clocks or managing time?

symptoms.name: sequencing_problems
symptoms.question: Do you find it difficult to remember the order of steps in a process?

symptoms.name: spatial_reasoning_difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you have trouble understanding spatial directions like left and right?

symptoms.name: handwriting_issues
symptoms.question: Is your handwriting often illegible or inconsistent?

symptoms.name: copying_difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you struggle to copy text from a book or board accurately?

symptoms.name: spacing_problems
symptoms.question: Do you have trouble spacing words and letters properly when writing?

symptoms.name: writing_fatigue
symptoms.question: Do you feel tired or experience discomfort when writing by hand?

symptoms.name: grammar_punctuation_errors
symptoms.question: Do you frequently make mistakes with grammar or punctuation when writing?

symptoms.name: following_instructions_difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you find it hard to follow spoken instructions, especially multi-step ones?

symptoms.name: frequent_repetition_requests
symptoms.question: Do you often ask people to repeat what they've said?

symptoms.name: background_noise_trouble
symptoms.question: Do you struggle to understand speech when there's background noise?

symptoms.name: mishearing_words
symptoms.question: Do you frequently misunderstand or mishear similar-sounding words?

symptoms.name: phonics_difficulty
symptoms.question: Do you have trouble associating sounds with their corresponding letters?
